posts.post_content: Anything without hexproof, shroud, indestructible, protection from red/black, or means of self bouncing is going to be blown up by this 2 mana common instant.
posts.html:
Anything without hexproof, shroud, indestructible, protection from red/black, or means of self bouncing is going to be blown up by this 2 mana common instant.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: TheWrathofShane (4/25/2013 8:27:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
My best friend and rival thought he was pretty clever when he shelled out all his money for playsets of [Lotleth Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotleth Troll), [Varolz, the Scar-Striped](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Varolz, the Scar-Striped), and [Death's Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death's Shadow). He decided to test out his combo against my new red/black budget exalted deck.  
  
Friend: "Ahaha, turn 5, and I have a 15/14 trampler with regenerate. And now I'll put an [Alpha Authority](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Alpha Authority) on him to make him hexproof. What do you have to say to that?"  
  
Me: "In response to Alpha Authority...I terminate it."  
  
Friend: "Big deal I'll just regen it-"  
  
Me: "Read the card Sean."  
  
Friend: (reads card) "...no...NO!...AAAAAHHHHHH!" (flips table)
posts.html:

Me: "In response to Alpha Authority...I terminate it."

Friend: "Big deal I'll just regen it-"

Me: "Read the card Sean."

Friend: (reads card) "...no...NO!...AAAAAHHHHHH!" (flips table)
